DOC.brief_summary: As Regenerative Medicine next level medicinal science , use mesenchymal cell become prevalent , Similarly stem cell use dental research well various clinical applications.This study aim evaluate overall effect osseointegration use Allogenic Mesenchymal Stem cell place dental implants.Healthy subject choose dental implant place bilaterally one standard surgical protocol use Allogenic Mesenchymal Stem cells.The implant stability check use Resonance frequency analysis ( RFA ) .The RFA value statistically evaluate various interval observation analyse test control side .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Allogenic Mesenchymal Stem Cells Osseointegration Dental Implants
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective single center study . A total 10 patient select treated dental implant bilaterally miss edentulous condition , support either removable fixed rehabilitation . The edentulous space either maxilla mandible . The study perform Department Implantology ( Sri Sai College Of Dental Surgery Research Center , Vikarabad , India ) . The study approve institutional ethic committee ( IEC ) . Informed write consent form . 27 . Case history record 28 . Photography videography waiver consent form 29 . Ethical Clearance Certificate 30 . CBCT 31 . Vital parameter data sheet 32 . Diagnostic report CBP , RBS , CT , BT Hg % 33 . Antibiotic anti-allergic prophylaxis . 34 . A local anesthetic solution contain 2 % lignocaine 1:100,000-epinephrine 2ml disposable syringe . 35 . Statistical analysis software IBM SPSS version 19 . METHODS Clinical Procedure Pre-operative planning base clinical radiographic examination . After thoroughly record case history . The following investigation do prior implant placement surgery : CBCT , CBP , CT , BT , Hg % , RBS , Vital sign relevant investigation . If parameter fulfill inclusion exclusion criterion , patient 's impression make study model pour . Intraoral extraoral photograph take . The surgical guide construct diagnostic models.Stem cell carry stem cell bank Department Implantology cryovial , safely place special device , contain dry ice , maintain viability stem cell . Surgical Procedure On day surgery , dental operatory thoroughly fumigated infection control protocols followed.The participant receive oral write information study shall provide informed consent along photography videography waiver consent . Antimicrobial prophylaxis ( amoxicillin 1gm ) antihistamine prophylaxis ( 20mg cetirizine ) orally 1 hour surgery give patient . The universal precaution protocol follow protect , patient dental assistant.The patient ask rinse Oral cavity chlorhexidine gluconate solution ( 0.2 % ) 1 minute surgery . IMPLANT PLACEMENT ON THE CONTROL SIDE To standardize protocol patient 's right side select control side leave side test side . The surgical procedure carry local anesthesia contain 2 % epinephrine 1:100,000 epinephrine . The surgical guide place teeth use mark position implant round drill till hit bone . Mucoperiosteal flap raise mid crestal incision intrasulcular incision extend one tooth mesially teeth distally . After full thickness flap elevation , osteotomy site prepare use drill sequence instruct manufacturer.The dental implant Nobel Biocare Replace select ( 4.3 *10mm size ) 4.3mm diameter 10mm length select place osteotomy site IF 40 Ncm.Before approximation flap , primary stability implant record ostell device , transducer attach device magnetic attachment smart peg attach implant plastic peg holder implant measure twice two different angle , around 90 degree parallel crestal line.The two measurement buccolingually mesiodistally record average value taken.The measurement value transfer implant stability quotient ( ISQ ) unit , give scale 1- 100 , 100 high degree stability work principle resonance frequency analysis ( RFA ) .The smart peg remove Healing abutment place dental implant . The flap suture monofilament suture 4-0 . IOPAR take KKD Radiograph system , standardize distance collimator IOPAR . IMPLANT PLACEMENT ON THE TEST SIDE To standardize protocol patient 's left side choose test side.The surgical procedure carry local anesthesia contain 2 % epinephrine 1:100,000 epinephrine . The surgical guide place teeth use mark position implant round drill till hit bone . Mucoperiosteal flap raise mid crestal incision intrasulcular incision extend one tooth mesially another tooth distally . After full thickness flap elevation , osteotomy site prepare use drill sequence instructed manufacturer . stem cell centrifuge sterile environment per instruction give stem cell bank . ( Thawing protocol ) Human mesenchymal stem cell ( hMSC ) primary cell successfully use infusion purpose.The follow recommend protocol thaw infusion cell : Remove Cryovial stem cell dry ice , defrost vial contain stem cell place palm constant , moderate agitation , ice ampule longer visible , immediately disinfect vial 70 % isopropanol.Working laminar flow hood , open vial transfer content sterile 15ml centrifuge tube centrifuge 3500 RPM 5 minute . Decant supernatant pellet add 1 ml saline.Mix properly cell ready infusion osteotomy site . Remove content sterile dappen dish infusion stem cell osteotomy site implant dip solution 3 minute stem cell adhere titanium implant surface . The dental surgeon performs case . The dental implant Nobel Biocare Replace select ( 4.3 *10mm size ) 4.3mm diameter 10mm length select place osteotomy site IF 40 Ncm11.Before approximation flap , primary stability implant record ostell device , transducer attach device magnetic attachment smart peg attach implant plastic peg holder implant measure twice two different angle , around 90 degree parallel crestal line.The two measurement buccolingually mesiodistally record average value taken.The measurement value transfer implant stability quotient ( ISQ ) unit , give scale 1- 100 , 100 high degree stability work principle resonance frequency analysis ( RFA ) .The smart peg remove Healing abutment place dental implant . The flap suture monofilament suture 4-0.IOPAR take KKD radiograph system , standardize distance collimator IOPAR . POST SURGICAL TREATMENT The patient advise take soft diet one week spit rinse next 24 hour . Antibiotics , Antihistamines , NSAIDs must continue 3 day . Postoperative edema must control corticosteroid . The suture remove one week postoperatively . Recall visit Weekly recall patient 12 week evaluation record implant stability measurement Ostell ISQ device . Patient safety measure evaluate every visit like unusual pain , swell , allergic reaction , inflammation , outgrowth , vital sign , blood assay unspecific reaction note . The emergency contact number provide patient report abnormal incidence immediately . The prosthetic part treatment carry 3 month either removable fixed rehabilitation . Statistical analysis Descriptive statistic compute summarize data central tendency dispersion . Two sample t-test applied see mean change outcome variable experimental control group . Repeated measure ANOVA apply see time change experimental control group . Where ever data follow uniformity , either transform data nonparametric statistical technique apply . The analysis perform use IBM SPSS Version 19.0 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients bilateral edentulous condition either partial complete . 2 . Patients maintain adequate oral hygiene 3 . Patients dimension alveolar jaw bone OcclussoGingival position > 10mm BuccoLingual position < 6mm . 1 . Systemic disease likely compromise Implant surgery like Diabetes Mellitus Type I , II Osteoporosis . 2 . Patients oral parafunctional habit like Bruxism . 3 . Smokers smoke 10 cigarette day . 4 . Selfdeclared pregnancy intention become Pregnant . 5 . The use Regenerative procedure conjunction Implant placement.Eg Grafts , Sinus Lift procedure .
